metadata.title: CVE-2020-27845 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There's a flaw in src/lib/openjp2/pi.c of openjpeg in versions prior to 2.4.0. If an attacker is able to provide untrusted input to openjpeg's conversion/encoding functionality, they could cause an out-of-bounds read. The highest impact of this flaw is to application availability.

criterions.comment: insighttoolkit4 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
openjpeg2 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-1ubuntu5').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
texmaker package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
